reference_details.siegeOrLowBorn: Siege Weapon, Lowborn Archers or Hooded Men

options.name: Black Knight's Tonic
options.description: The first time the bearer’s model suffers an unsaved wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), the model gains Immune (Multiple Wounds) until the end of the phase.

options.name: Oriflamme
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Horror.

options.name: Banner of Roland
options.description: The bearer’s unit gains Devastating Charge (Aegis (5+)). In addition, enemy units with Stand and Shoot cannot use this rule against the bearer’s unit.

options.name: Relic Shroud
options.description: The bearer can cast Breath of the Lady (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell (5+).

options.name: Lord's Arms
options.description: The restriction on the maximum number of Proper Ranks (for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded, and Rank Bonus purposes) from Lance Formation is increased to three for the bearer's unit.

options.name: Castellan's Crest
options.description: One use only. May be activated immediately before declaring a Charge with the bearer or the bearer’s unit in the Charge Phase. Failed Charge Range rolls of the bearer or the bearer’s unit must be rerolled until the end of the phase. Other Characters Charging out of the bearer’s unit are not affected.

options.name: Tristan's Resolve
options.description: +1 Att and +1 AP. After a successful to-hit roll, the attacker may discard one of the hits with this weapon and choose an Enchanted Weapon carried by the model the attack was allocated towards. This Weapon Enchantment is ignored for the rest of the game.

options.name: Mortal Reminder
options.description: +1 Str, +1 AP, and Terror.

options.name: Divine Judgement
options.description: After the wielder successfully completes a Charge, apply the following until the wielder is no longer Engaged in Combat: +2 Str and +2 AP.

options.name: Uther's Mettle
options.description: +X Att, where X is equal to the number of ranks of a single enemy unit on contact with the wielder up to a maximum of 4. If multiple units, use the unit with the most ranks. These extra Attacks can only be allocated towards Rank-and-File models. If the attacks cannot be allocated towards Rank-and-File models, such as when the wielder is in a Duel, the attacks are lost.

options.name: Prayer Etched
options.description: +1 Arm and Aegis (+1, max. 4+).

options.name: Percival's Panoply
options.description: +2 Arm.

options.name: Fortress of Faith
options.description: Immune (Lethal Strike) while the bearer's unit contains at least one Rank-and-File model.

options.name: Sacred Chalice
options.description: The bearer gains Magic Resistance (1). When the bearer’s unit is the target of an enemy Spell the bearer gains Channel (1) until the end of following Magic Phase.

options.name: Quin
options.description: The model is a Wizard Adept that chooses Witchcraft as its Path of Magic. If on foot, the model gains Scout.

options.name: Cleric
options.description: The model gains Clergy, Ordo Minister, Holy Vows, and loses Commonfolk.

options.name: Bannerman
options.description: The model becomes the Battle Standard Bearer.

options.name: Minstrel
options.description: The model gains Musician and is a Wizard Apprentice that uses Divination as its Path of Magic.

options.name: Castellan
options.description: The model part gains Captain, Commanding Presence (6", Commonfolk) and Disciplined.

options.name: Honour
options.description: The bearer's unit Charge Range rolls are Maximised. While Engaged with an enemy unit’s Front Facing, the bearer gains Devastating Charge (+2 Att).

options.name: Justice
options.description: At Agility Step 0, the model performs X additional Standard Melee Attack, where X is equal to the number of HP losses suffered in the Round of Combat by Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit. X can never be greater than 3.\ Note that HP losses suffered at Agility step 0 are applicable, and that if the model is unable to perform these additional attacks, the attacks are lost.

options.name: Valour
options.description: The bearer gains Fearless and its Standard Melee Attacks gain Multiple Wounds (2, towards Res 5 or more).

options.name: Excellence
options.description: Duels issued by the bearer must (whenever possible) be accepted. The bearer part gains Lethal Strike, and when its Standard Melee Attacks Roll a natural ‘6’ to wound, the attack gains Multiple Wounds (2).

options.name: Faith
options.description: The bearer gains Holy Vows and Fearless. If the bearer’s unit is the target of an Orison while Engaged in Combat, add one Blessing Token to your pool.

options.name: Forbearance
options.description: When using a Shield, the model gains Distracting (1).

options.name: Generosity
options.description: The model gains Attached,Exclusive (Rank-and-File).\ Rank-and-File models with Nobility in the unit that the bearer is deployed in gain a Bastard Sword and Weapon Master until the end of the game.

options.name: Trebuchet (4+) and change its Height to 3
